item.description:
massmouth's successsful story slam season continues at Bella Luna with the theme, "somebody's gotta do it." Whether it's a nasty job, responsibility, or you ended in the wrong place at the wrong time, you've got story. Bring it on Sunday.

Doors open at 6:30pm. Stories begin at 7:00pm. $7.00 ticket.

Slam will be co-hosted by massmouth storyteller Robin Maxfield and former City Councillor, John Tobin who served West Roxbury, Jamaica Plain and parts of Roslindale and Mission Hill for 9 years. He is currently vice president of City and Community Affairs at Northeastern University. He has emceed at local comedy clubs for years ans has some interesting stories to tell.

At a story slam, participants tell a five minute personal story on the theme. Ten lucky tellers have their names drawn out of a hat. The stories are judged by 5 volunteer judges and massmouth awards prizes to the top 2 stories of the night. All stories are videotaped and appear on massmouth's website --- www.massmouth.com

group.name: CLOSING DOWN THIS MEETUP GROUP: massmouth storytellers

item.name: 'somebody's gotta do it" story slam in Jamaica Plain
